description:
In this talk I'll introduce the problem of selection bias in the context of machine learning, illustrate its consequences and present some solutions.

Slides: /redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.google.com%2Fpresentation%2Fd%2F1YyTTrozvmUZuKU0VwU3rS2lXk5pJ5HzZdF82KaVxoxA%2Fedit%3Fusp%3Dsharing&v=3ZWCKr0vDtc&redir_token=PNVGhDijA-OXwSPODnagJ4S1Q6N8MTUzMjc1ODc1M0AxNTMyNjcyMzUz&event=video_description
title: Selection bias: The elephant in the room
